verbs.description: le’veon bell [V: has] not told steelers yet he will report le’veon bell may have plans to report to the pittsburgh steelers this week but he has not told the team that according to a report the pittsburgh post - gazette gerry dulac reported on sunday that the team has not heard from bell yet about the running rejoining the team steelers have not heard from le'veon bell that he might report this week per team source gerry dulac pittsburgh steelers bell pittsburgh pittsburgh post - gazette steelers
